summary: Many economy seats on United Airlines have 30 inches of room .<n>Some airlines offer as little as 28 inches of space .<n>The FAA conducts tests on how quickly passengers can leave a plane .<n>These tests are conducted using planes with 31 inches between each row .<n>While most airlines stick to a pitch of 31 inches or above, some fall below this .

Rahul Kumar, 17, climbed into the enclosure at Kamla Nehru Zoological Park .<n>He ran towards the animals shouting: 'Today I kill a lion or a lion kills me!'<n>Fortunately, he fell into a moat and was rescued by zoo security .

Dougie Freedman is set to sign a new two-year deal at Nottingham Forest .<n>The former Crystal Palace boss replaced Stuart Pearce in February .<n>Forest's owners are pleased with Freedman's job at the City Ground .

Liverpool were linked with a move for Fiorentina goalkeeper Neto in January .<n>The 25-year-old's contract at the Florence-based club expires in June .<n>Neto's agent Stefano Castagna claims he is wanted by a number of clubs .

The former Olympian and reality TV star, 65, will speak in a 'far-ranging' interview with Sawyer for a special edition of '20/20' on Friday April 24 .<n>The interview comes amid growing speculation about the father-of-six's transition to a woman, and follows closely behind his involvement in a deadly car crash in California in February .<n>While the Kardashian women are known for enjoying center stage, they will not be stealing Bruce's spotlight because they will be in Armenia when the interview airs, according to TMZ .
